title: Venezuela 's budget balance in relation to GDP 2018
yAxis: Budget balance in relation to GDP
summary: In general Budget balance in relation to GDP has rose over the Year.
Budget balance in relation to GDP is roughly constant from 2011 to 2013, roughly decreasing from 2013 to 2014, roughly constant from 2014 to 2016, and lastly gradually increasing from 2016 to 2018.
The line drastically increased by 1.8 times from Year 2017 to 2018.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2017 and 2018.
Maximum Budget balance in relation to GDP, about 30.56 was reported at Year 2018
Minimum Budget balance in relation to GDP about 8.24 was reached at Year 2011
min_summary: Overall Budget balance in relation to GDP has increased over the Year.
Budget balance in relation to GDP is roughly constant from 2011 to 2013, roughly decreasing from 2013 to 2014, roughly constant from 2014 to 2016, and lastly gradually increasing from 2016 to 2018.
mid_summary: Overall Budget balance in relation to GDP has increased over the Year.
Budget balance in relation to GDP is roughly constant from 2011 to 2013, roughly decreasing from 2013 to 2014, roughly constant from 2014 to 2016, and lastly gradually increasing from 2016 to 2018.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2017 and 2018.
Maximum Budget balance in relation to GDP, about 30.56 was reported at Year 2018

max_summary: Overall Budget balance in relation to GDP has increased over the Year.
Budget balance in relation to GDP is roughly constant from 2011 to 2013, roughly decreasing from 2013 to 2014, roughly constant from 2014 to 2016, and lastly gradually increasing from 2016 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
Maximum Budget balance in relation to GDP, about 30.56 was reported at Year 2018
Minimum Budget balance in relation to GDP about 8.24 was reached at Year 2011
The line rapidly increased by 83.99% from Year 2017 to 2018.
